original: @25a * // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @25a * // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Mañjuśrī, the youthful one.

original: dbang po tha mas rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po tha mas rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa ni /
translated: The cultivation of the six recollections for those of the lowest faculties is as follows:

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: recollection of the Buddha, recollection of the Dharma, recollection of the Saṅgha, recollection of generosity, recollection of moral discipline, and recollection of the deities.

original: de yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: de rnams kyi yon tan dran pa'i sgo nas gus pa bskyed cing bdag gis kyang de'i sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi yon tan dran pa'i sgo nas gus pa bskyed cing bdag gis kyang de'i sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
translated: By means of recollecting their qualities, one should generate respect and engage in them oneself.🔽As for the recollection of the Buddha, it is said:

original: de yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
analyzed: de yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
translated: The Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One,🔽the one with proper knowledge and conduct,

original: 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
translated: the Sugata, the knower of the world, the unsurpassed trainer of those who can be trained,

original: yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya'o //
translated: the teacher of gods and humans, the Buddha, the Blessed One.

original: de lta bu'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rtogs shing dran pa nyid ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rtogs shing dran pa nyid ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: In this way, the recollection of the Buddha is the realization and recollection of the qualities of the Buddha.🔽The recollection of the Dharma is the recollection of the qualities of the Dharma of the Lord, which is well-proclaimed,

original: chos rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa yang dag par mthong ba /
analyzed: chos rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa yang dag par mthong ba /
translated: which is visible,

original: dus tshod mkhyen pa /🔽'di mthong ba la nye bar gtod pa /
analyzed: dus tshod mkhyen pa / 'di mthong ba la nye bar gtod pa /
translated: which is timeless,

original: mkhas pa so sor yang dag par rig pa /
analyzed: mkhas pa so sor yang dag par rig pa /
translated: which is a rationally analyzed superior knowledge,🔽which has a good meaning,

original: don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po //
analyzed: don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po //
translated: which has good words,

original: thog mar dge ba /🔽bar du dge ba /
analyzed: thog mar dge ba / bar du dge ba /
translated: which is wholesome in the beginning,🔽wholesome in the middle,

original: tha mar dge ba /
analyzed: tha mar dge ba /
translated: and wholesome in the end.

original: ma 'dres pa yongs su gsal ba'o //
analyzed: ma 'dres pa yongs su gsal ba'o //
translated: It is unadulterated and completely clear.

original: de lta bu la dmigs shing yon tan dran par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu la dmigs shing yon tan dran par bya'o //
translated: One should recollect the qualities of the Dharma, taking it as an object in this way.

original: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi @25b nyan thos kyi dge 'dun legs par zhugs pa /🔽drang por zhugs /🔽rigs par zhugs pa /
analyzed: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi @25b nyan thos kyi dge 'dun legs par zhugs pa / drang por zhugs / rigs par zhugs pa /
translated: The recollection of the Saṅgha is the recollection of the qualities of the Saṅgha of disciples of the Lord, who have entered well,🔽who have entered straight,🔽who have entered properly,

original: mthun par zhugs pa /🔽kun du sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa /
analyzed: mthun par zhugs pa / kun du sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa /
translated: who have entered the way,🔽who are worthy of gifts,🔽who are worthy of hospitality,

original: rab tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa /
analyzed: rab tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa /
translated: who are worthy of offerings,

original: sbyor ba'i 'os su gyur pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i 'os su gyur pa /
translated: who are worthy of reverential salutations,🔽who are unsurpassed fields of merit in the world.

original: 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa'o //
translated: the unsurpassed field of merit for the world.

original: de'i yon tan rjes su dran par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i yon tan rjes su dran par bya'o //
translated: One should recollect his qualities.

original: gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni kye ma skyes bu ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa'i nang nas ser sna dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos sbyin 'khor mor byed pa /
analyzed: gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni kye ma skyes bu ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa'i nang nas ser sna dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos sbyin 'khor mor byed pa /
translated: The recollection of generosity is as follows: “Oh! Among those who have abandoned the stain of stinginess, those who give the gift of Dharma with a mind free of stinginess,

original: lag rkyong ba rnams gtong ba la dga' ba /
analyzed: lag rkyong ba rnams gtong ba la dga' ba /
translated: those who are openhanded, those who delight in generosity,

original: 'di ni bdag gis legs par rnyed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni bdag gis legs par rnyed pa yin no //
translated: I have found what is excellent.

original: de ltar rjes su dran par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rjes su dran par bya'o //
translated: ” One should recollect in that way.

original: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni tshul khrims ma nyams pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni tshul khrims ma nyams pa /
translated: The recollection of morality is as follows: “The Saṅgha of hearers of the Bhagavat is endowed with morality that is unbroken,🔽without flaw, unadulterated,

original: skyon med pa ma 'dres pa ma gos pa /
analyzed: skyon med pa ma 'dres pa ma gos pa /
translated: unstained,

original: rang gtsang yod pa /
analyzed: rang gtsang yod pa /
translated: pure,

original: mkhas pas bsngags pa /
analyzed: mkhas pas bsngags pa /
translated: and praised by the wise.

original: ting nge 'dzin shes pa'o zhes de lta bur dran par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin shes pa'o zhes de lta bur dran par bya'o //
translated: They know meditative absorption. ” One should recollect in that way.

original: lha rjes su dran pa ni lha rnams ni che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: lha rjes su dran pa ni lha rnams ni che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
translated: The recollection of the gods is as follows: “The gods are endowed with great qualities.

original: lhar skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa /
analyzed: lhar skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa /
translated: They are the cause for being born as a god.

original: tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bdag nyid dang / lha'i yon tan mtshungs par byas nas lha'i yon tan dang sbyar nas rjes su dran par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bdag nyid dang / lha'i yon tan mtshungs par byas nas lha'i yon tan dang sbyar nas rjes su dran par bya'o //
translated: Having made the qualities of morality, concentration, wisdom, self, and the deity equal, one should recollect them in conjunction with the qualities of the deity.

original: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so//
translated: The instruction on the meditation on the six recollections composed by the master Mañjuśrīmitra is complete.
